Question: Phoenix AI S.A. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AMD

Ryzen 8000G ‘Phoenix’ APUs

 - First to bring purpose-built AI accelerators to desktop PCs
 - Part of the Ryzen 8000G lineup
 - Designed for advanced AI performance on desktop systems
Summary_cn:
AMD

Ryzen 8000G‘凤凰’处理器

- 首次将专为桌面电脑设计的人工智能加速器引入
- 归属于Ryzen 8000G系列处理器
- 专为桌面系统提供高级人工智能性能的设计
